short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get Free games from Epic Games store

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Epic Games store free game notification. 

Introducing our new browser extension that helps you find free games from the Epic Games Store!

Our extension makes it easy to stay up-to-date with the latest free game offerings from Epic Games, without having to constantly check the website or miss out on any great deals. Available for popular browsers like Chrome, Firefox, and Microsoft Edge, our extension is completely free to download and use.

When you open a new tab in your browser, our extension displays a list of free games available on the Epic Games Store, complete with thumbnail images and game descriptions. With just a few clicks, you can learn more about each game and download it directly from the Epic Games Store.

Customize your experience by selecting your preferred background image and accessing quick links to popular websites. Plus, our extension allows you to set up notifications when new games become available, so you'll never miss a great deal again.

At our core, we're committed to protecting your privacy. That's why we only collect anonymous usage data to improve our product and provide you with the best possible experience.

In summary, our extension is the perfect solution for gamers who want to stay on top of the latest free games from the Epic Games Store. Download our extension today and start exploring all the great free games waiting for you!

- Fast
- No registration
- No permission required

Changelog:

1.1.2 - Lighter and faster
